attributes.action: Ensure the integrity of committee members meet appropriate minimum standards
attributes.background: We the British public expect our representitives to have standards of integrity comensurate with their position in Government. We demand a vetting process which prevents MP's under criminal invesigation passing laws or judgements over others.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what minimum standards you would like to be applied, and how the vetting process could work.
